Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory88.png'}

{1: '1', 3: 'It has been years after that tide. Pfaff is no longer prohibiting Rosetta from meeting others. Like today, Rosetta is even occasionally tasked with buying supplies from the port.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Rosetta, over here!'}
{3: 'A girl from the fur shop waves at Rosetta, whom she immediately recognizes in the crowd of people.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lisa', 3: 'Huehuehue, lemme guess. More rabbit pelts for sale?'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Morning, Lisa. Nope, it's a reindeer pelt! Yesterday, Grandpa shot... ", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fisher', 3: "Still no seafarin'?! That mad narwhal is still rollin' and flailin' about?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Discordant noises travel over from the market entrance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Port Manager', 3: "Not yet... If we don't take it out while it's in the harbor, it'll just come back again and again.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: "Some fine job 'em Forest Guards are doin'... Useless pricks.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Are you guys talking about... the mechanical narwhal?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Port Manager', 3: "What other narwhal is there? Thanks to that fatso, all the port's wrecked!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'You wanna destroy it just because of that?!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: 'Whaddya mean "just because of that?" Port\'s down—no fishes—we all gon\' be starvin\'!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Grandpa said the Narwhal's the Guardian Spirit of humanity. It wouldn't just destroy the port for nothing. There must be a reason...", 4: '3'}
{3: "To Rosetta's surprise, the fishermen around her bursts out laughing."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fisher', 3: "Bwahahaha... You killin' me, girl. You hear that? She thinks the narwhal is a guardian spirit! Hahahahaha...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'What are you all laughing at!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Port Manager', 3: "Everyone 'cept you drifters know that WE made that narwhal. And ye call it a guardian spirit, hah!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "So what?! If you made the Guardian Spirit, and now you're destroying it out of inconvenience... You all are just selfish!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fisher', 3: "What does a lil' brat like you know!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The fisherman could no longer control his temper and rushes over to grab Rosetta. However, Rosetta quickly catches his wrist and twists it behind his back.'}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: "Ow! You lil' sardine! Damn it! Let go!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I won't let you go unless you apologize to the Guardian Spirit and to us!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Port Manager', 3: 'Damn it!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The port manager could no longer take it. He clenches his fist to swing at Rosetta.'}
{3: 'However, his punch is stopped mid-swing by the steel grip of an old but firm hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: "She's my granddaughter. Just a child. Don't be so hard on her, big guy.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The port manager shakes off Pfaff. At the sight of Pfaff, Rosetta lets go of the fisherman.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Port Manager', 3: "Pah... You're that weird old man living in the forest.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fisher', 3: 'Bloody outsiders! Ruthless savages, the lot of you... ', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: "Call the guards and have 'em jailed! Jailed!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Pfaff shields Rosetta behind the rowdy crowd. He slams the butt of his shotgun on the ground, letting off a loud thud.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: 'Listen up!', 4: '1'}
{3: "The presence of the shotgun, coupled with Pfaff's fierce glare instantly silences the commotion."}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: 'I will hunt the narwhal alone tomorrow, but at one request.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fisher', 3: "Hah! An ol' man with one foot inna grave thinks he can kill the whale? Quit joking around!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mocking laughter of the crowd resumes, but Pfaff seems to pay no mind. He pushes his way through the crowd, coming before the port manager.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Port Manager', 3: 'What makes you think you can kill the narwhal?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pfaff lowers his voice so that only the port manager could hear. At his words, the manager stiffens and takes on a solemn expression.'}
{2: 'Port Manager', 3: 'Are you serious...? This is too much for a joke.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: 'I stake my life on it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Port Manager', 3: 'Hmph, your life means little to me. But...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The manager shifts his gaze at the Rosetta behind Pfaff. For this little girl, the old man would never lie.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Port Manager', 3: 'Alright, fine. I will inform the captain.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Port Manager', 3: "But remember... If you fail, you will bear all the consequences. I'm sure you know what that means for you and your granddaughter.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Pfaff glances at the port manager. He grabs Rosetta's hand and leaves the port under the gazes of the crowd."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: 'Is there something you want to say?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Grandpa, didn't you say that the narwhal was the Guardian Spirit of humanity?! Why are you killing it? I don't get it!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pfaff sighs. The steam from his breath escapes into the snowy forest.'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: "It's okay. You don't need to understand. Just know that this is my decision. That's all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The thing about the Guardian Spirit protecting us—protecting humanity... Was it all a lie?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: "Rosetta, it's just a mechanical narwhal. You are a human; you need human friends.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta is about to retort, but Pfaff quickly interrupts her.'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: "I'll set out tomorrow morning. If I don't return in a month, run. Go as far as you can into the forest.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Grandpa...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory69.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Waking up next morning, Pfaff finds Rosetta gone.'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: "Rosetta! No, it couldn't be...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pfaff immediately packs his gear and rushes to the seashore for departure.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory103.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'To his surprise, Rosetta is waiting there with her spear.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Grandpa, even if you don't tell me what you plan on doing, I wanna help you at least.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "If you're gonna kill the Guardian Spirit, I wanna be a witness to it!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pfaff stares at Rosetta bitterly. This girl grew up to be just as stubborn as he is.'}
{3: 'Without a word, he untethers the small fishing boat. Starting the engine, the two gradually leave shore.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Two humans, one Narwhal... Their fates intertwine in the vast blue sea...'}
